roleset_name: watch what you eat, (restricting one's) food intake, regulating or modifying eating behavior

roles.descr: distinguishing characteristic of the diet (ultimately indicates food consumed or avoided)
roles.descr_trans: 饮食的显着特征（最终表明消耗或避免的食物）

roleset_name_trans: 注意你吃的东西，（限制一个人的）食物摄入量，调节或改变饮食行为
